verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
Be Thou my vision
O Lord of my heart
Naught be all else to me
Save that Thou art

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Thou my best thought
By day or by night
Waking or sleeping
Thy presence my light

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Be Thou my wisdom
Be Thou my true Word
I ever with Thee
And Thou with me Lord

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Thou my great Father
I Thy true son
Thou in me dwelling
And I with Thee one

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Riches I heed not
Nor man's empty praise
Thou mine inheritance
Now and always

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Thou and Thou only
Be first in my heart
High King of heaven
My treasure Thou art

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
High King of heaven
My victory won
May I reach heaven's joys
O bright heaven's Sun

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Heart of my own heart
Whatever befall
Still be my vision
O Ruler of all
